#labels install
#This page tells how to install sase on your machine.

= Requirement =

 * Install the Java Runtime Environment version 1.5.x or later


= Details =

 * Download the SASE package and extract it to a suitable directory.
* Set the SASE_HOME environment variable to point to the YFilter installation directory.
* Add $SASE_HOME/bin to the PATH to access all the executables.
* Add $SASE_HOME/lib/jeval.jar to the CLASSPATH.
